message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a living. I can meet you in the middle, but I need to get at least $105 for the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I'd like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
